content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I’m your AI assistant here to help schedule your electrical service. To get started, could I please have your full name?
Thanks, Mike! Could you please provide the address where you need the electrical service?
Got it, 483 Maple St, Springfield. Let me just verify that this location is within our service area.
Your address is within our service area. When would be an ideal time for our electrician to visit you?
Preferably this weekend, Saturday afternoon if possible.
Thanks, Mike. Checking our availability for Saturday afternoon now.
We have openings on Saturday afternoon. Can I book your electrical service appointment for you then?
Yeah, sounds good. What’s this gonna cost? I’m kind of tight on budget right now.
I understand. Let me provide you with a price estimate for your electrical service.

The estimated price for your requested electrical service typically ranges from $120 to $180, depending on the exact work needed. We can provide a detailed quote after the technician’s initial assessment at your appointment. Would you like to proceed with booking for Saturday afternoon?
Hang on, gotta check on something real quick. One sec...
